readingMnemonic: This word uses the kun'yomi readings of all three kanji. The 小 and the 粉 both use kun'yomi that you haven't learned yet, but luckily they are both the same! Just think about how "small" things are like <reading>子</reading> (こ), and "powder" is also small. So both 小 and 粉 are read こ.
